description: This Java class defines the Booking entity for a taxi booking backend system. It models the booking request, including fields like user, driver, pickup and dropoff locations, status, and timestamps. It uses JPA annotations for ORM mapping and includes lifecycle callbacks for timestamp management.

classes.name: Booking
classes.description: Entity representing a ride request, including user, driver, locations, status, and timestamps. Managed via JPA with lifecycle hooks for timestamps.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Lifecycle callback to set creation and update timestamps upon entity persistence.

methods.name: onUpdate
methods.description: Lifecycle callback to update the 'updatedAt' timestamp upon entity update.
